info.title: PBP Stats API
info.description: Documentation for PBP Stats API endpoints

get.summary: Gets all games for season and season type

parameters.description: Multiple seasons should be separated by a comma. ex 2020-21,2019-20

schema.title: Season
schema.description: Multiple seasons should be separated by a comma. ex 2020-21,2019-20

parameters.name: Season

get.summary: Gets totals for player/team/lineup for single/multiple seasons

parameters.description: Multiple seasons should be separated by a comma. ex 2020-21,2019-20

schema.title: Season
schema.description: Multiple seasons should be separated by a comma. ex 2020-21,2019-20

parameters.name: Season

parameters.description: Multiple types should be separated by a comma. ex High,VeryHigh

schema.title: Leverage
schema.description: Multiple types should be separated by a comma. ex High,VeryHigh

parameters.name: Leverage

parameters.description: only for Team, Player or Opponent, no StartType, FromDate or ToDate. ex. 5v5. When querying multiple starter states separate by comma

schema.title: Starterstate
schema.description: only for Team, Player or Opponent, no StartType, FromDate or ToDate. ex. 5v5. When querying multiple starter states separate by comma

parameters.name: StarterState

get.summary: Gets game logs for player/team/lineup

parameters.description: Multiple seasons should be separated by a comma. ex 2020-21,2019-20

schema.title: Season
schema.description: Multiple seasons should be separated by a comma. ex 2020-21,2019-20

parameters.name: Season

get.summary: Gets career stats by season for player/team/lineup
Get player stats when a given 5 player lineup is on the floor

parameters.description: Multiple seasons should be separated by a comma. ex 2020-21,2019-20

schema.title: Season
schema.description: Multiple seasons should be separated by a comma. ex 2020-21,2019-20

parameters.name: Season

parameters.description: lineup ids are "-" separated nba.com/stats player ids sorted as strings

schema.title: Lineupid
schema.description: lineup ids are "-" separated nba.com/stats player ids sorted as strings

parameters.name: LineupId

get.summary: Gets all players for league
Gets all players who played for team in given season(s)

parameters.description: Multiple seasons should be separated by a comma. ex 2020-21,2019-20

schema.title: Season
schema.description: Multiple seasons should be separated by a comma. ex 2020-21,2019-20

parameters.name: Season

get.summary: Gets game stats by player/lineup
Gets offensive and defensive efficiency relative to league average for that season
Gets offensive, defensive and net efficiency for all on/off combinations of players selected

parameters.description: Multiple seasons should be separated by a comma. ex 2020-21,2019-20

schema.title: Season
schema.description: Multiple seasons should be separated by a comma. ex 2020-21,2019-20

parameters.name: Season

parameters.description: Multiple types should be separated by a comma. ex High,VeryHigh

schema.title: Leverage
schema.description: Multiple types should be separated by a comma. ex High,VeryHigh

parameters.name: Leverage

get.summary: Gets counts for all passer to scorer assist combinations
Gets opponent lineup stats for each opposing lineup a lineup has played

parameters.description: Multiple seasons should be separated by a comma. ex 2020-21,2019-20

schema.title: Season
schema.description: Multiple seasons should be separated by a comma. ex 2020-21,2019-20

parameters.name: Season

parameters.description: lineup ids are "-" separated nba.com/stats player ids sorted as strings

schema.title: Lineupid
schema.description: lineup ids are "-" separated nba.com/stats player ids sorted as strings

parameters.name: LineupId

get.summary: Gets lineup and team stats for given set of players on/off
get.description:
In addition to the listed query params, this endpoint also accepts the following for player and opponent player filters

Player Filter Paramater format:

index, amount (Exactly | GreaterThan | LessThan), number, description (OnFloor | OffFloor | PlayedInGame | DidNotPlayInGame | Started | CameOffBench)

example: 0Exactly1OnFloor

value is comma separated player ids


Opponent Player Filter Paramater format:

Opponent, amount (Exactly | GreaterThan | LessThan), number, description (OnFloor | OffFloor)

example: OpponentExactly1OnFloor

value is comma separated player ids

parameters.description: Multiple seasons should be separated by a comma. ex 2020-21,2019-20

schema.title: Season
schema.description: Multiple seasons should be separated by a comma. ex 2020-21,2019-20

parameters.name: Season

parameters.description: Multiple types should be separated by a comma. ex High,VeryHigh

schema.title: Leverage
schema.description: Multiple types should be separated by a comma. ex High,VeryHigh

parameters.name: Leverage

parameters.description: ex. 5v5. When querying multiple starter states separate by comma

schema.title: Starterstate
schema.description: ex. 5v5. When querying multiple starter states separate by comma

parameters.name: StarterState

parameters.description: Separated team ids by comma for multiple teams

schema.title: Opponent
schema.description: Separated team ids by comma for multiple teams

parameters.name: Opponent

get.summary: Gets frequency and net efficiency for each team broken down by the number of starters on the floor

parameters.description: Multiple seasons should be separated by a comma. ex 2020-21,2019-20

schema.title: Season
schema.description: Multiple seasons should be separated by a comma. ex 2020-21,2019-20

parameters.name: Season

get.summary: Gets pace and efficiency for each team broken down by how the possession started
Gets pace and efficiency for each season broken down by how the possession started
Gets offensive, defensive and net efficiency for all x player combinations of players selected

parameters.description: Multiple seasons should be separated by a comma. ex 2020-21,2019-20

schema.title: Season
schema.description: Multiple seasons should be separated by a comma. ex 2020-21,2019-20

parameters.name: Season

parameters.description: lineup ids are "-" separated nba.com/stats player ids sorted as strings

schema.title: Lineupid
schema.description: lineup ids are "-" separated nba.com/stats player ids sorted as strings

parameters.name: LineupId

get.summary: Gets percentage of possessions a team was up/down by x points

parameters.description: Multiple seasons should be separated by a comma. ex 2020-21,2019-20

schema.title: Season
schema.description: Multiple seasons should be separated by a comma. ex 2020-21,2019-20

parameters.name: Season

get.summary: Gets breakdown of when player is on the floor each game

parameters.description: Multiple seasons should be separated by a comma. ex 2020-21,2019-20

schema.title: Season
schema.description: Multiple seasons should be separated by a comma. ex 2020-21,2019-20

parameters.name: Season

get.summary: Gets team and opponent four factors stats with player on and off the floor

parameters.description: Multiple seasons should be separated by a comma. ex 2020-21,2019-20

schema.title: Season
schema.description: Multiple seasons should be separated by a comma. ex 2020-21,2019-20

parameters.name: Season

get.summary: Gets overall league year-over-year stats
Gets stats for each team for given stats

parameters.description: Multiple seasons should be separated by a comma. ex 2020-21,2019-20

schema.title: Season
schema.description: Multiple seasons should be separated by a comma. ex 2020-21,2019-20

parameters.name: Season

get.summary: Gets breakdown of when each combo was on the floor each game for all combos of given players

parameters.description: Multiple seasons should be separated by a comma. ex 2020-21,2019-20

schema.title: Season
schema.description: Multiple seasons should be separated by a comma. ex 2020-21,2019-20

parameters.name: Season

get.summary: Gets possession length frequency for each team and the league as a whole

parameters.description: Multiple seasons should be separated by a comma. ex 2020-21,2019-20

schema.title: Season
schema.description: Multiple seasons should be separated by a comma. ex 2020-21,2019-20

parameters.name: Season

get.summary: Gets summary stats based on score and time parameters
Gets shooting stats based on score and time parameters

parameters.description: Multiple seasons should be separated by a comma. ex 2020-21,2019-20

schema.title: Season
schema.description: Multiple seasons should be separated by a comma. ex 2020-21,2019-20

parameters.name: Season

get.summary: Gets all shots for query parameters
Gets stats and details for possessions that meet query parameters. If more than 500 possessions meet criteria, only 500 possessions will be returned
get.description:
In addition to the listed query params, this endpoint also accepts the following for player and opponent player filters

Player Filter Paramater format:

index, amount (Exactly | GreaterThan | LessThan), number, description (OnFloor | OffFloor | PlayedInGame | DidNotPlayInGame | Started | CameOffBench)

example: 0Exactly1OnFloor

value is comma separated player ids


Opponent Player Filter Paramater format:

Opponent, amount (Exactly | GreaterThan | LessThan), number, description (OnFloor | OffFloor)

example: OpponentExactly1OnFloor

value is comma separated player ids

parameters.description: Multiple seasons should be separated by a comma. ex 2020-21,2019-20

schema.title: Season
schema.description: Multiple seasons should be separated by a comma. ex 2020-21,2019-20

parameters.name: Season

parameters.description: Multiple types should be separated by a comma. ex High,VeryHigh

schema.title: Leverage
schema.description: Multiple types should be separated by a comma. ex High,VeryHigh

parameters.name: Leverage

parameters.description: Separated team ids by comma for multiple teams

schema.title: Opponent
schema.description: Separated team ids by comma for multiple teams

parameters.name: Opponent

get.summary: Gets top results by game or season
get.description: Season is optional if Type is game

get.summary: Gets assist network data
get.description: Needs either GameId or both Season and SeasonType query params

get.summary: Gets on/off data for query params
get.description:
Stat is required query param if stat_type is stat

PlayerId is required query param if stat_type is player or team

parameters.description: Multiple seasons should be separated by a comma. ex 2020-21,2019-20

schema.title: Season
schema.description: Multiple seasons should be separated by a comma. ex 2020-21,2019-20

parameters.name: Season

parameters.description: Multiple types should be separated by a comma. ex High,VeryHigh

schema.title: Leverage
schema.description: Multiple types should be separated by a comma. ex High,VeryHigh

parameters.name: Leverage

get.summary: Gets all teams for current season for league
Gets win probability for given conditions

schema.title: Team With Ball Pregame Win Prob

get.summary: Gets win leverage for given conditions

schema.title: Team With Ball Pregame Win Prob
End Of Possession Seconds Remaining In Game

get.summary: Gets breakeven 2pt percentage needed for 2pt shot to be better than 3pt shot for given percentage

schema.title: Shot Result Seconds Remaining In Game

PtsPutbacks.title: Ptsputbacks
PtsPutbacks.description: Putbacks are defined as unassisted FGA within 2s of OREB by the player who got the OREB

HeaveAttempts.title: Heaveattempts
HeaveAttempts.description: Heaves are defined as shots from 40+ ft with <2s remaining in period

Fg2aBlocked.title: Fg2Ablocked
Fg2aBlocked.description: Number of 2pt attempts by the player/team/lineup that were blocked

Fg3aBlocked.title: Fg3Ablocked
Fg3aBlocked.description: Number of 3pt attempts by the player/team/lineup that were blocked

SelfOReb.title: Selforeb
SelfOReb.description: OREBS on missed your own missed shot

Blocked2s.title: Blocked2S
Blocked2s.description: Number of 2pt attempts blocked by the player/team/lineup

Blocked3s.title: Blocked3S
Blocked3s.description: Number of 3pt attempts blocked by the player/team/lineup

BlockedArc3.title: Blockedarc3
BlockedArc3.description: Number of above the break 3 attempts blocked by the player/team/lineup

BlockedAtRim.title: Blockedatrim
BlockedAtRim.description: Number of rim attempts blocked by the player/team/lineup

BlockedCorner3.title: Blockedcorner3
BlockedCorner3.description: Number of corner 3 attempts blocked by the player/team/lineup

BlockedLongMidRange.title: Blockedlongmidrange
BlockedLongMidRange.description: Number of long mid range attempts blocked by the player/team/lineup

BlockedShortMidRange.title: Blockedshortmidrange
BlockedShortMidRange.description: Number of short mid range attempts blocked by the player/team/lineup

RecoveredBlocks.title: Recoveredblocks
RecoveredBlocks.description: Blocked shots recovered by your team

FirstChancePoints.title: Firstchancepoints
FirstChancePoints.description: Points scored excluding second chance points

Period1Fouls0Minutes.title: Period1Fouls0Minutes
Period1Fouls0Minutes.description: Minutes played with 0 fouls in the first quarter

BlocksRecoveredPct.title: Blocksrecoveredpct
BlocksRecoveredPct.description: Percentage of blocked shots recovered by your team

AtRimOffReboundedPct.title: Atrimoffreboundedpct
AtRimOffReboundedPct.description: Percentage of Player's Misses At Rim That Are Offensive Rebounded

ShortMidRangeOffReboundedPct.description: Percentage of Player's Short Mid-Range Misses That Are Offensive Rebounded

LongMidRangeOffReboundedPct.description: Percentage of Player's Long Mid-Range Misses That Are Offensive Rebounded
